author: Alex Oxrud
bio: Over 10 years experience in designing, building, and deploying websites and apps.
aboutMe: I am a full-stack developer living in Salt Lake City, UT who loves to deliver superior digital products and help businesses succeed with their goals. I am interested in creating scalable web apps with exceptional UI/UX. I spend my days leading the frontend web app for Weight Watchers, Inc.

projects.name: Clinical Trial App
projects.description: In order test the efficacy of a new points program, now called "Smart Points", Weight Watchers needed an app to test it. We put the new algorithm to the test with hundreds of participants and even had  Oprah Winfrey as a special tester.

projects.name: Food & Activity Tracking Web App
projects.description: Currently leading front end development of Weight Watcher's online tool to track food, exercise and weight. Used by millions of people each month, the web experience ties in with WW's suite of apps to help their members's lose weight and live healthy lives.

projects.name: Hostus App
projects.description: A startup aiming to disrupt the restaurant reservation space, Hostus focused on enabling hosts to effectively manage the complexities of running a restaurant.

projects.name: Small business website
projects.description: Business communication training that helps individuals, teams, and leaders learn to hold conversations that achieve results. Website built on a custom content management system.

projects.name: Real Talk App
projects.description: Mobile app tool for improving the quality and effectiveness of interpersonal interactions. The app guides an individual on how to structure an effective conversation.

images.alt: Various Screenshots of Real Talk App

projects.name: Small e-commerce website
projects.description: Fully customized e-commerce site of homeopathic products, complete with automatic shipping label printing and a detailed analytics report on sales performance.

projects.name: Large e-commerce website
projects.description: Internet's premier distributors of preowned Rolex watches. Hired to enhance search system and address performance bottlenecks.

projects.name: Wrist Watch Community and e-commerce
projects.description: A community for watch & horology discussion. Enhanced existing forum with fully-featured portal and marketplace.

projects.name: Movie Club Web App
projects.description: Searchable catalogue of movies that allow streaming on multiple devices via the browser. Uses IMDB and Netflix to enhance the movie details and ratings.
